title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key is left blank, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: In the properties file, if the key is left blank but has a valid value, the externalized text should still be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Set the externalized text in the chart title.
2. Leave the key blank in the properties file, but make sure it has a valid value.
